duties_responsibilities.duty: Close inbound sales leads and manage objections effectively.
Handle warm, inbound leads and maintain a high volume of sales conversations.
Demonstrate a high level of business acumen in sales activities.
Use lead management tools to continue to fill the sales calendar.

education_certification.credential: 2+ years of experience as an Account Executive, Inside Sales Representative, or high volume sales position in a similar or adjacent industry. Expertise in leading sales conversations and objection handling.
